movie.title: Abigail
movie.description_intro: A young girl Abigail lives in a city whose borders were closed many years ago because of an epidemic of a mysterious disease. Abby's father was one of the sick - and he was taken when she was six years old. Going against the authorities to find her father, Abby learns that her city is actually full of magic. And she discovers in herself extraordinary magical abilities.
movie.description_full: A young girl Abigail lives in a city whose borders were closed many years ago because of an epidemic of a mysterious disease. Abby's father was one of the sick - and he was taken when she was six years old. Going against the authorities to find her father, Abby learns that her city is actually full of magic. And she discovers in herself extraordinary magical abilities.

movies.title: The Happiness of a Mother
movies.summary: A mother who is diagnosed with terminal cancer, prepares to leave her family and her little son who is diagnosed with Autism.
movies.description_full: A mother who is diagnosed with terminal cancer, prepares to leave her family and her little son who is diagnosed with Autism.
movies.synopsis: A mother who is diagnosed with terminal cancer, prepares to leave her family and her little son who is diagnosed with Autism.

movies.title: 365 Days
movies.summary: Massimo Torricelli, a young and handsome boss of a Sicilian Mafia family, has no other option but to take over after his father has been assassinated. Laura is a sales director in a luxurious hotel in Warsaw. She has a successful career, but her private life lacks passion. She is taking one last shot to save her relationship. Together with her bone-headed boyfriend, Martin and some other friends, she takes a trip to Sicily. She does not expect that Massimo, the most dangerous man on the island, will get in her way, kidnap her, hold her captive and give her 365 days - to fall in love with him.

movies.title: Downton Abbey
movies.summary: The continuing story of the Crawley family, wealthy owners of a large estate in the English countryside in the early twentieth century.
movies.description_full: The continuing story of the Crawley family, wealthy owners of a large estate in the English countryside in the early twentieth century.
movies.synopsis: The continuing story of the Crawley family, wealthy owners of a large estate in the English countryside in the early twentieth century.

movies.title: Born & Raised
movies.summary: This intelligently crafted, seven-time award winning festival favorite, tells the story of a young man, in a small seaside town, who learns a thing or two about love, luck and life from his well-traveled, outlaw grandfather. Born & Raised is a gritty, coming-of-age drama with a lot of heart and a ton of laughs.

Born & Raised is a gritty, coming-of-age drama with a lot of heart and a ton of laughs.
